thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 26 of 1307
thread.title: paul joyce
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by paul joyce

author: paul joyce
title: paul joyce
text:
The gentleman at the front desk worked with me on what tires were available with no pressure to buy the more expensive tires. He went over options and explained the good points of the tires. The car was ready well before the time I was to pick it up.
I would recommend this company.
